nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.tiles

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.tiles.Tile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExitTile, InfoTile, ItemTile, Wall

    public abstract class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    This abstract class defines the required properties for a tile. For example it can be used to represent a cell in a two dimensional board. Adds a level of abstraction as each type of tile can be generally described with this interface.
     

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Item item
      An item which might be collectable by the player from this tile.

    • Field Detail

      • item

        protected Item item
        An item which might be collectable by the player from this tile. By having an item objects such as player can be on different backgorunds such as the empty tile or the info tile

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(Item item)
        Constructor that will call by the sub-types to initiate the logic of collectable items. Note the tile CAN be null and it will represent when the tile is empty.
        Parameters:
        item - an object which can be collected by the player from this tile

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public abstract java.lang.String getName()
        Get unique identifier for this tile. Each concrete type should return a different value.
        Returns:
        the sequence of characters identifying this tile

      • isAccessible

        public abstract boolean isAccessible(Entity entity)
        Specify whether an entity could access the given tile, this might depend by the items collected by the entity. Note this method should not alter the items contains in the collection passed as a parameter nor their properties. Indeed, this method should be given an unmodifiable collection.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity which would like to access this tile. It cannot be null
        Returns:
        whether this tile can be currently accessed

      • hasAction

        public boolean hasAction()
        Check if this item in the tile is linked with an action. By default items do not have an action
        Returns:
        whether this item has an associated

      • applyAction

        public Maze.SpecialEvent applyAction(Entity entity)
        Apply the action linked with the item in this tile. This might affects who interacts with this item.
        Parameters:
        entity - who is interacting with this item. It cannot be null.
        Returns:
        This method return a special event or null depending by what happens

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Item itemToCheck)
        Check whether this tile has an item.
        Parameters:
        itemToCheck - whose presence in this tile is to be tested
        Returns:
        true if this tile contains the specified element

      • containsItemType

        public boolean containsItemType(java.lang.Class<? extends Item> type)
        Check whether this tile has an item of the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - class which will be checked if item is instance of it
        Returns:
        whether the tile contains an Item

      • replaceItem

        public Item replaceItem(Item newItem)
                 throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Insert an item to this cell.
        Parameters:
        newItem - item to add to this tile
        Returns:
        the item which was previously in this time, null if it was empty
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if an item can't be added to this tile

      • getItem

        public Item getItem()
        Get the item in this tile. Modifications on this item are not allowed
        Returns:
        the item on this tile
